Hope you had a great weekend. I just had a look at the changes, I prefers the previous version, but I just want to make the Early typers of treatment more one/two sentences rather than three and also, not make the font smaller.

Hope that makes sense. I am happy to wait until September if I used up the care plan.

Kind regards

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

As for this part, can we make some changes? I feel like it is too long especially the benefits part. If we can make some of the sentences to two rather than four and move slightly to the right for Types of Early Orthodontic Treatment. Or even if we can make it like Considerations so they can see the title and expand if they want further information?



Also, I would like to remove the boxes below if that's okay.



Kind regards

Yawai Pann
